description: A comprehensive PostgreSQL schema defining core tables, types, functions, and triggers for a Cross-Cloud Resource Management system. It includes enums for provider and operation status, tables for cloud accounts, credentials, resources, costs, recommendations, automation rules, operations, activity logs, and associated functions and triggers.

methods.name: public.costs_aggregates
methods.description: Returns aggregated cost data for the current user, including daily costs, monthly total, and delta percentage compared to the previous month.
